text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
La carrera es tan increíble que<n>ninguno de
nosotros recuerda ni respirar.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
En el momento en que Fuji Kiseki<n>pasa la línea
de meta con todas sus<n>fuerzas, las gradas
resuenan con gritos de<n>júbilo.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Uff, uff...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ¡Argh!

text_block_list.name: Espectador A
text_block_list.text: ¡Fue increíble! ¡Qué carrera tan<n>fantástica!

text_block_list.name: Miembro A del Fan Club de Fuji
text_block_list.text: ¡Ohhh! ¡Es tan hermosa! Fuji, eso fue<n>asombroso!

text_block_list.name: Miembro B del Fan Club de Fuji
text_block_list.text: ¡Muchas gracias por el maravillososhow! ¡Sniff!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Su audiencia de miles pendía de<n>cada una de
sus palabras.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Cada respiro y movimiento suyo era<n>como un
sueño para ellos.

text_block_list.name: Madre de Fuji
text_block_list.text:
"¡Ahora graben la imagen de mi forma<n>en esos
hermosos ojos suyos, oscuros<n>y profundos como
la noche!"

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ¡Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Es esa misma imagen...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
(¡Cálmate. Debo seguir siendo una<n>artista hasta
el final!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki cierra los ojos suavemente y<n>inclina la
cabeza reverencialmente hacia<n>las gradas.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Me siento increíblemente honrada de<n>recibir una
ovación tan llena de amor.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
El drama de mi último año termina aquí,<n>y es hora
de que los actores regresen a<n>los bastidores.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
¡Pero por favor, no se preocupen! Mi<n>historia
aún no termina.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She spreads her hands wide, and a single<n>firework
shoots into the sky and blooms.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text: Oooooh!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
My efforts today will continue into the<n>future,
and I promise to bring more<n>miracles to you all!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Goodbye for now! Be well, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She exits her stage, leaving behind the<n>twinkling
sky, and everyone sees her off<n>with eyes full of
admiration.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: And thus concludes chapter one.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I didn't win, but the audience remained<n>
untouched by the grays of<n>disappointment.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Everyone had such a good time watching<n>me
progress through the challenge I set<n>for myself.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Just knowing that makes me happier<n>than
anything.
choice_data_list: You gave them the greatest show ever.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, I did. Thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
The ruby sunset illuminates the profile of<n>her face
as she speaks.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
This is my path... No, that's not it. This is<n>where I
belong.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She turns away from me abruptly before<n>I have a
chance to say anything.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, we can't spend forever wallowing<n>in
sentimentality!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
The end is only the beginning. There are<n>still
plenty of places I need to go. So<n>come on,
Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Together, we can go anywhere.
